gurmukhi: diRsit drs smdrs iDAwn Dwir duibDw invwir eyk tyk gih lIjIAY
transliteration: Drisati Daras Samadaras Dhiaan Dhaari , Doubidhaa Nivaari Ayk Tayk Gahi Leejeeai ?
translation: With harbouring the thought of seeing all alike and beholding the Lord and discarding feelings of I, my or me from the mind, 'acquire the support of the Lord.

gurmukhi: sbd suriq ilv Asquiq inMdw Cwif AkQ kQw bIcwir moin bRq kIjIAY
transliteration: Sabad Surati Liv Asatouti Nindaa Chhaadi , Akad Kadaa Beechaari Moni Brat Keejeeai ?
translation: Leaving praise and slander of others, one should Endeavour, to unite the divine words of the Guru in the mind, feel engrossed in it. Its contemplation is beyond description. So it is best to remain quiet.

gurmukhi: jgjIvn mY jg jg jgjIvn ko jwnIAY jIvn mUl jugu jugu jIjIAY
transliteration: Jagajeevan Mai Jag Jag Jagajeevan Ko , Jaaneeai Jeevan Mool Jougu Jougu Jeejeeai ?
translation: Consider God, the Creator and the Universe-His creation is as one. And once God is known thus, then one lives for many eons.

gurmukhi: eyk hI Anyk Aau Anyk eyk srb mY bHm ibbyk tyk pRym rs pIjIAY ]252]
transliteration: Ayk Hee Anayk Au Anayk Ayk Sarab Mai , Braham Bibayk Tayk Praym Ras Peejeeai ?252?
translation: If one understands that His light pervades in all the Living beings and light of all living beings pervades in Him. Then this knowledge of the Lord dispenses loving elixir to seeker. (252)
